---
title: "Dashboard title"
output:
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
    css: "custom_styles.css"
    theme:
      version: 4
      bg: "white"
      fg: "#2E3440"
      primary: "#caf0f8"
      base_font: 
        google: Roboto
      heading_font:
        google: Sen
      code_font:
        google: 
          # arguments to sass::font_google() 
          family: JetBrains Mono
          local: false
    navbar:
      - { title: "Report", href: "https://google.com", align: right, icon: ion-earth}
      - { title: "About X", href: "https://google.com", align: right, icon: fa-lightbulb}
    includes:
      after_body: footer.html
      
runtime: shiny
---
